scripts.mkdist: if not exist dist mkdir dist
scripts.minify: npm run mkdist && html-minifier src/index.html --collapse-whitespace --minify-css --minify-js -o dist/index.html
scripts.copy: npm run mkdist && copy src\*.jpg dist && copy src\*.png dist && copy src\*.ico dist && copy src\*.js dist && copy src\*.webmanifest dist
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run copy
